chapters.title: Chapter 34: Judgment
chapters.info: Dapple, p. 537—One of the wolves. She was part of the pack that was near Elyas when Perrin learned he could talk to wolves. Her fur fades through a dozen shades of gray. She was the alpha female, the leader of her pack. She and her pack were agitated by the Whitecloaks under Geofram Bornhald.
